metadata.title: CVE-2020-24503 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient access control in some Intel(R) Ethernet E810 Adapter driversfor Linux before version 1.0.4 may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable information disclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-raspi').
